ability.Serene Grace: This Pokemon's moves have their secondary effect chance doubled.

Leech Seed.effect: Plants a seed on the target. Each end of turn, the target loses 1/8 of its HP and the user drains that amount of HP.

Psychic.effect: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.

Ancient Power.effect: Has a 10% chance to raise all the user's stats by 1 stage.

Giga Drain.effect: User recovers 50% of the damage dealt.

Recover.effect: Restores up to 50% of the user's maximum HP.
